alert.note: Alert for Jack (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued February 21 at 8:38PM CST until February 22 at 2:00AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN WISE...SOUTHEASTERN JACK...NORTHERN PARKER AND NORTHEASTERN PALO PINTO COUNTIES... At 837 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mineral Wells State Park, or over Mineral Wells, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Weatherford, Mineral Wells, Azle, Briar, Willow Park, Reno, Springtown, Hudson Oaks, Boyd, Cool, Poolville, Cottondale, Mineral Wells State Park, Millsap and Sanctuary. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Move indoors immediately.
